Articles.Content:
I'm sure it has to exist somewhere, but I could not find a vector art flag template so I made one myself in Affinity.  I'm not sure where this would best be hosted but I suppose I can worry about that if demand is high enough - let me know if there's an easy place to upload this for general use. 

For the time being, feel free to DM me and I'll forward the .afphoto workspace, which you can then customize to your heart's content.

Edited April 17, 2023 by GalileOh-No
Corrected image

19 hours ago, GalileOh-No said:

I'm not sure where this would best be hosted but I suppose I can worry about that if demand is high enough - let me know if there's an easy place to upload this for general use.

If you have a github, you can upload it there.
